betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Those who have succumbed to the nightmare and forsaken their personhood, they seem to leave behind traces of their aspirations, desired, hopes for the future, and even regrets.
In this place, these regrets, hopes, and aspirations take physical form, they become Lumps. 
These lumps can be shaped into weapons and tools.
During my fights for Terra, I figuratively carried the hopes and aspirations of others on my shoulders. Here, I can do it literally.
